TEXT.S: = Bgurah branaw = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Cwosisyang ka alang Bgurah branaw. 31 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 106 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 98% niqan 104 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 2% niqan 2 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Truku82%, Bunun2%, Tayal4%, Amis2%, Seejiq/Seediq/Seejiq/Seejiq/Sediq2%, Paiwan1%, Cou1%, ni rahuq na o5%.
